---
title: "NoiseEffect"
author: "John Mount"
date: "August 29, 2015"
output: html_document
---


```{r}
library('ggplot2')

nFrame <- readRDS('nResFrame.RData')

nFrame$model <- reorder(nFrame$model,-nFrame$test.auc)
ggplot(data=nFrame,aes(x=noiseLevel,y=test.auc,color=model)) +
  geom_point() + stat_smooth(se=FALSE)

nFrame$model <- reorder(nFrame$model,-nFrame$test.ndeviance)
ggplot(data=nFrame,aes(x=noiseLevel,y=test.ndeviance,color=model)) +
  geom_point() + stat_smooth(se=FALSE)

nFrame$test.isodev[is.infinite(nFrame$test.isodev)] <- 1
nFrame$test.isodev <- pmin(1,nFrame$test.isodev)

nFrame$model <- reorder(nFrame$model,-nFrame$test.isodev)
ggplot(data=nFrame,aes(x=noiseLevel,y=test.isodev,color=model)) +
  geom_point() + stat_smooth(se=FALSE)

```
